scripts.prepare-docs: PUBLIC_URL=/ethereal/ && rimraf docs && mkdir docs && ln -sf ../packages/examples/docs/static ./docs/static
scripts.start-docs: npm run build && npm run prepare-docs && cd packages/examples/docs && npm run start
scripts.start-pride: npm run build && cd packages/examples/pride && npm run start
scripts.bundle-docs: npm run build && npm run prepare-docs && cd packages/examples/docs && npm run bundle
scripts.syncpack: syncpack fix-mismatches && syncpack format && syncpack set-semver-ranges --prod --dev && syncpack set-semver-ranges --peer --semver-range '>='
scripts.dev-docs: npm run syncpack && npm-run-all -p -r watch start-docs
scripts.dev-pride: npm run syncpack && npm run start-pride
